content: Failed to update tariff plan. Try again later or contact the sales department.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display an error message when a tariff plan update fails, prompting the user to try again later or contact the sales department. It appears as an error notification in a UI component that handles payment updates, such as a button click event handler.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Try again later" is translated literally, but a more natural Armenian equivalent would be "Փորձեք նորից հետո" or "Դիտեք այն կրկնակի հետո". The current translation "Փորձեք ավելի ուշ" sounds slightly awkward.
The phrase 'Try again later' is translated as '後でもう一度試すか' which is overly literal and slightly awkward in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'Please try again later'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 後で再度お試しください (Atarashiku o-tarashite kudasai)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'tariff plan' is translated as 'plano de tarifário'. While understandable, 'plano tarifário' or 'plano de tarifas' would be more natural in Portuguese. 'Tarifário' is an adjective and sounds awkward when directly translated in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não foi possível atualizar o plano tarifário. Tente de novo mais tarde ou contacte o departamento de vendas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "contact the sales department" is not accurately translated. "Entre em contato" is too generic and doesn't convey the specificity of contacting the sales department.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Entre em contato com o departamento de vendas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අය ක්‍රමය යාවත්කාල කිරීමට අසමත් විය' doesn't accurately reflect 'Failed to update tariff plan'. 'අය ක්‍රමය' translates to 'payment system' or 'income system,' which isn't the intended meaning. It should refer to the tariff plan itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අතරාමුළු ගෙවුම් සැලසුම යාවත්කාල කිරීමට අසමත් විය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'අතරාමුළු' is uncommon and may be misinterpreted. Although it broadly means 'tariff', it's not the standard term. Consider a more commonly used term related to plans or rates.
While grammatically correct, the sentence structure could be slightly improved for natural flow. Adding a particle or reordering phrases can enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තීරු සැලසුම යාවත්කාල කිරීමට අපට නොහැකි විය. නැවත උත්සාහ කරන්න හෝ අලෙවි ක්‍රියාංශය අමතන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Ažuriranje tarifnog plana nije uspelo' directly translates to 'Updating the tariff plan failed'. While understandable, a more natural and idiomatic Serbian phrasing would be 'Nije uspelo ažuriranje tarifnog plana' or 'Došlo je do greške pri ažuriranju tarifnog plana'.
The Serbian word 'odeljenje prodaje' translates to 'sales department', but a more common and user-friendly term would be 'prodajni odeljenje' or simply 'prodaja'.
